originalLyrics:
Des yeux qui font baisser les miens
Un rire qui se perd sur sa bouche
Voilà le portrait sans retouche
De l'homme auquel j'appartiens

Quand il me prend dans ses bras
Qu'il me parle tout bas
Je vois la vie en rose
Il me dit des mots d'amour
Des mots de tous les jours
Et ça m'fait quelque chose

texts.title: Daily Observations
text: Je vois comment il parle avec les autres,
Il dit qu'il prend son temps mais font attention,
Je baisser la voix quand j'appartiens à ce moment,
Il perd patience mais on comprend pourquoi.

texts.title: Portrait Description
text: Dans sa vie, l'homme au portrait sourit,
Son rire illumine ses yeux brillants,
Les bras ouverts, sa bouche exprime la joie,

texts.title: Quick Update
text: Tous ont quelque chose à dire.

texts.title: Love Note
text: Une rose et des mots d'amour,
C'est la chose qui marque mes jours.

texts.title: Reflection
text: Il me regarde sur sa photo,
Quand les miens se posent sans qui comprendre,

texts.title: Evening Thought
text: Je suis dans ses pensées en ça,

phrases.originalFrench: Je vois comment il parle avec les autres,
Il dit qu'il prend son temps mais font attention,
Je baisser la voix quand j'appartiens à ce moment,
Il perd patience mais on comprend pourquoi.
Dans sa vie, l'homme au portrait sourit,
Son rire illumine ses yeux brillants,
Les bras ouverts, sa bouche exprime la joie,
Tous ont quelque chose à dire.
Une rose et des mots d'amour,
C'est la chose qui marque mes jours.
Il me regarde sur sa photo,
Quand les miens se posent sans qui comprendre,
Je suis dans ses pensées en ça,

solutions.primaryTranslation: I see how he talks to others
alternatives: I notice how he speaks with others
I observe the way he talks to people
distractors: I observe the way they speak to them
I noticed how he shares with the others
I can see how he annoys everyone else

solutions.primaryTranslation: He says he's taking his time but be careful
alternatives: He claims he's going slow but watch out
He says he's not rushing but pay attention
distractors: He says he's out of time but be cautious
He does say that it takes time but pay attention
He tells he takes his time however stay clear

solutions.primaryTranslation: I lower my voice when I'm part of this moment
alternatives: I speak softly when I belong in this moment
I quiet down when I'm in this moment
distractors: I reduce the volume when present
I lower the tone whenever I am disconnected to the now
I lower the voice for belonging

solutions.primaryTranslation: He's losing patience but we understand why
alternatives: He's getting impatient but it's understandable
He's running out of patience but we get it
distractors: He's fiery but we all know
He does lose his patience a lot
He is running out of patience yet we don't know why

solutions.primaryTranslation: In his life, the man in the portrait smiles
alternatives: The man in the portrait has a smile on his face
Life shows in the smiling man's portrait
distractors: Out of this life, the gentleman of the picture is smiling
During his lifetime, the fellow in the painting beams
In the life, the man at portrait grins

solutions.primaryTranslation: His laughter lights up his bright eyes
alternatives: His smile makes his bright eyes shine
His laughter brightens his sparkling eyes
distractors: His smile illuminates their shinning eyes
His mirth makes radiant the gleaming eyes
His laughing is brighter than his shining eyes

solutions.primaryTranslation: Arms wide open, his mouth expresses joy
alternatives: With open arms, his face shows happiness
His open arms and smile radiate joy
distractors: The open arms, his lips cry happiness
With arms extended, his face displays the joy
Open armed, he is happy

solutions.primaryTranslation: A light touch perfects the image
alternatives: A subtle adjustment completes the picture
A gentle touch finishes the image
distractors: A subtle adjustment completes his appearance
One minor modification to finish the portrait
The subtle touch completes an image

alternatives: Well, everything has calmed down now
There you have it, all is settled now
distractors: Here we are, all is low
That's it, everything's at the bottom
Here, everything has gone down

alternatives: They all have something to say
Each person has something to contribute
distractors: They all do have some their say
All but one have something to tell
They all have one thing to say

solutions.primaryTranslation: It makes me smile every time.
alternatives: That makes me smile each time.
It brings a smile to my face every time.
distractors: I'm laughing all time
This thing gets me to laugh
It makes to me smile at times.

solutions.primaryTranslation: A rose and words of love,
alternatives: A rose accompanied by love notes,
distractors: One rose plus romantic love,
Some rose along with affection,
A single rose as well as phrases expressing romance,

alternatives: That's what makes my days special.
distractors: It is the thing which defines my daily life.
This is the matter that characterizes my time.
This is what is making my daily life.

solutions.primaryTranslation: He looks at me in his photo,
alternatives: He's watching me from his photograph,
In his photo, he gazes at me,
distractors: The man watches me on his picture,
He gazes at me from his photograph,
He regards me from his picture,

solutions.primaryTranslation: When my eyes rest there without understanding,
alternatives: As my gaze lingers, not comprehending,
While my eyes settle there, confused,
distractors: While my ones settle without who to understand,
As mine land with no comprehending,
When mines rest themselves devoid of comprehension,

solutions.primaryTranslation: At which moment we find ourselves like this.
alternatives: How we ended up this way.
The moment we find ourselves here.
distractors: At what time to meet again thus.
When to be found therefore.
At which point we end up in this way.

solutions.primaryTranslation: I am in his thoughts in this way,
alternatives: I exist in his thoughts like this,
This is how I remain in his thoughts,
distractors: I find myself among their thinking about it,
I exist within his mind regarding that,
I'm inside their thoughts concerning this matter,
For him to remain still available.
That he stays continuously around.
Let him stay still here.
